decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive strategies, utilizing a mix of creatures and spells to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game. It takes advantage of various lands to support its aggressive plays, while also including removal spells to deal with threats from the opponent. The deck also includes a mix of powerful legendary creatures with unique abilities to further enhance its aggressive game plan and out value the opponent in the long run.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a combination of powerful spells and abilities from a variety of different cards, including Nissa, Resurgent Animist and Memory Deluge. By strategically using cards like Ill-Timed Explosion and Virtue of Strength, as well as maintaining a strong board presence with Aftermath Analyst, players can dominate the battlefield and outplay their opponents. The deck aims to establish board control and outvalue the opponent through efficient use of resources and powerful card synergies.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures and utilizing cards that allow for multiple attacks per turn. By combining efficient creatures like Venerated Rotpriest and Jawbone Duelist with powerful spells like Bring the Ending and March of Swirling Mist, the deck aims to quickly build a strong board presence and close out games before the opponent can stabilize. Skrelv's Hive and other support cards help to maintain pressure and ensure a steady stream of threats to overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. By utilizing efficient creatures such as Imodane's Recruiter and Knight-Errant of Eos, along with support cards like Resolute Reinforcements and Warleader's Call, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early in the game. Additionally, the inclusion of removal spells like Gleeful Demolition and Case of the Gateway Express helps to maintain control of the battlefield. This deck focuses on delivering powerful attacks and putting pressure on the opponent to quickly close out the game.

The main concept of this deck is to maintain control over the game by utilizing a variety of spells to disrupt your opponent's strategy while drawing into powerful cards that can help you pull ahead. The deck focuses on card advantage, counter spells, and removal to outlast your opponent and secure victory. With a combination of counterspells, removal, and card draw, this deck aims to control the game by limiting your opponent's options and overwhelming them with powerful spells and creatures.

The main idea of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing powerful creatures like Glissa Sunslayer and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, along with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, you aim to control the battlefield and continuously apply pressure. Additionally, cards like Duress and Liliana of the Veil help disrupt your opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage. Overall, the deck focuses on a fast and aggressive strategy to outpace and outmatch your opponent in a 1 vs 1 setting.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing a mix of creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It includes powerful creatures like Elesh Norn and Sheoldred, combined with disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Case of the Shattered Pact. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, with a mix of lands to ensure the deck can play its threats on curve. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing a variety of control spells and creatures to outmaneuver and outlast opponents. It includes a mix of powerful creatures like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, along with spells like Depopulate and Leyline Binding to control the board. The deck also includes cards for ramping up mana like Herd Migration and Boseiju, Who Endures, as well as utility spells like Spelunking and Cartographer's Survey. With a diverse mix of cards designed to disrupt opponents and maintain board advantage, this deck aims to slowly grind out victories through careful resource management.

This deck focuses on utilizing small aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It also includes disruption spells to control the opponent's board and protect its own creatures. The deck includes a mix of creatures with abilities that either generate value or provide additional utility to maintain pressure on the opponent. The mana base is optimized to ensure smooth and consistent gameplay, allowing the deck to deploy threats quickly and effectively. Overall, this deck aims to be fast-paced and proactive in order to secure victories swiftly.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with efficient creatures and combat tricks. It aims to maintain board presence and apply pressure early on, utilizing cards like Imodane's Recruiter, Resolute Reinforcements, and Warden of the Inner Sky to build a strong battlefield. By curving out with aggressive creatures and supporting them with powerful spells like Gleeful Demolition and Warleader's Call, the deck seeks to close out the game swiftly before the opponent can establish a strong defense. Additionally, the deck includes lands like Cavern of Souls and Eiganjo, Seat of the Empire to enhance its creature-based strategy.

This aggro Red Deck Wins focuses on dealing quick damage to the opponent using a combination of burn spells and aggressive creatures. The key strategy involves playing efficient, low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Bloodthirsty Adversary, while using spells like Lightning Strike and Play with Fire to clear the way for direct attacks. Urabrask's Forge and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide additional sources of damage, while Slickshot Show-Off adds some versatility. Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance and Mishra's Foundry help ensure consistent land drops to keep up the pressure.
